        public void displayException(java.lang.String exceptionName,
                             java.lang.String message)
        Displays user-friendly information about exception that occured. This method has a hint parameter set default to null. See more information at: displayException
        Parameters:
        exceptionName - Name of the exception thrown.
        message - Message included in the thrown exception.

      • displayException

        public void displayException(java.lang.String exceptionName,
                             java.lang.String message,
                             java.lang.String hint)
        Displays user-friendly information about exception that occured.
        Parameters:
        exceptionName - Type name of the exception.
        message - Message from exception.
        hint - How to not invoke the exception again.
